item.title: ellen add a quote by Ray Cummings
item.description: "Time is what keeps everything from happening at once." -- Ray Cummings

item.title: ellen add a quote by Alan Wilson Watts
item.description: "You are that vast thing that you see far, far off with great telescopes." -- Alan Wilson Watts

item.title: ellen add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: ellen add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Summer afternoonâ€”summer afternoon; to me those have always been the two most beautiful words in the English language." -- Henry James

item.title: ellen add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: ellen add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles... ...they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: ellen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain
